thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: r warne
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by r warne

author: r warne
title: r warne
text: We have only ever used local estate agents to find our tenants and it's always been successful but expensive .Using an online agent seemed a bit false but I am extremely impressed by the whole experience. It's been very easy to use and we had a good amount of enquiries and we have now rented our property within the week which is fantastic.Thankyou upad
